name: Hold It
description:
The name speaks for itself – Hold It is a fast-paced arcade hyper casual 2D game. Hold to traverse the reversed gravity of Hold It world through dangerous and challenging obstacles and platforms.

The obstacles start off with very simple obs, but as the game progresses, more hard and challenging obstacles are put in front of you. And the only way to tackle these utterly challenging obstacles is to hold or tap touch on your screens for a precise reversed gravitational effect on the Player character.

Download and play through some of the most challenging obstacles ever, and win your way through with high scores to show off your friends and colleagues.
